localizedMeta.description:
THIS CONTENT IS NOT COMPATIBLE WITH Android™ DEVICES.

This simple application puts a set of role playing dice right at your fingertips. It has all of the standard dice that players of tabletop RPGs expect.

Dice included:

20 sided
12 sided
10 sided
8 sided
6 sided
4 sided

The application uses standard random number generation so there is an equal chance for each result. In other words the virtual dice aren't weighted in the slightest so feel free to use them in your next game. It also features a log of previous die rolls so you can look back and see what you had roller previously.

Package size: 3477 KB - More storage space required for install

Compatibility information:
Number of players for local play: 1 Player

Supported interfaces/sensors
- Touchscreen
- Controller / On-screen controller

Supported languages:
English(United States)/English(United Kingdom)

Bread Vision Studios 2014

Android is a trademark of Google Inc.
